heading.title: Selected projects mixing illustration and photography
heading.description: A peek into the launch kits, digital experiences, and storytelling experiments from the studio.

projects.title: Sunrise Sips Packaging
projects.description: A fizzy morning beverage campaign layered with doodled fruit bursts and collage photography.

projects.title: Neighborhood Library Microsite
projects.description: Modular web components built for a volunteer-led library network with community spotlights.

projects.title: Festival Identity Kit
projects.description: Illustrated flora, friendly typography, and signage for a week-long arts festival.

projects.title: Cozy Corner Game Assets
projects.description: Hand-painted tilesets and UI overlays for a slice-of-life mobile game prototype.

projects.title: Studio Notebook Series
projects.description: Risograph notebook covers celebrating gesture studies and color theory drills.

projects.title: Village Market Rebrand
projects.description: A farm-to-table identity with illustrated produce stamps and responsive menu boards.
